item.title: Causal Impact on Leads Generation
item.description: Background In the business process, the marketing team has a role to play in increasing the brand awareness of a product. When the marketing team’s efforts are successful to get the customer’s attention to find out the product, it will generate a lead. In a simple way, leads are people who are interested in a business product. In the digital era, leads can be interpreted as people who visit websites directly or through advertisements, people who like, share content or product campaigns.
